title: ChatLab

privacy.title: Privacy First

import.clickHint: Click to select or drag chat records to import

errors.no_messages: No messages parsed. Please check if the file format is correct.

migration.title: Database upgrade required
migration.description: {count} database(s) need to be upgraded for new features.
migration.note: The upgrade usually takes only a few seconds and won't lose any data.
migration.errorHint: This is usually caused by corrupted database files. Please delete the failed sessions from the sidebar and re-import them.
